2006-08-30

Keep your eyes peeled…

...Stuart and I are in here somewhere - you have to look really hard - to be honest I haven't spotted us yet but I do remember seeing us when it was first shown so I guess the problem is that I have no idea what I looked like 15 or 16 years ago - I certainly had more hair than I do now...

This show slotted in at number 2 in my most recent Top 6 shows of all time. I smiled all the way through this video...

Teenage Fanclub - Everything Flows on SnubTV
